name: Voidsmen
description:
This is my first game please leave as much criticize as you can.

In the vacuum of space, there lies a menace called the Breanzel, a mysterious race that seems to be made up of robots for no signs of life has been detected thus far, they had come from the eastern fringes of the galaxy and have been equaling and sometimes winning against the unbeatable Earthian Empire. But to the rest of the galaxy they are a blessing and a curse, as they attack all life and have destroyed other weaker empires. But there is hope, a mysterious ship, a fighter nonetheless has been fighting a destroying attacking Breanzel ships. Is it an Earthian experimental fighter, a rogue Breanzelian, or maybe an agent of god. But one thing is known, its name, the Voidsmen.
